title: My Purrfect Cat Hotel
description: Welcome to My Purrfect Cat Hotel, a super cute cat hotel simulation management game. Enjoy cute and vivid cartoon cat animations. This is the vacation spot for all meow stars, and your mission is to create the most cozy cat hotel. Serving a variety of adorable cats and catering to their needs. Make your hotel the most popular animal tycoon hotel.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Cat Mini Restaurant
description: In this heartwarming and healing simulation management game "Meow Flavor Restaurant", you will become a little cat owner who loves cooking and personally create your own dream restaurant. Starting from a small cat house kitchen, gradually upgrading equipment, developing new recipes, recruiting cute cat employees, until becoming the most popular internet celebrity restaurant in the city! More than 30 cats with different personalities and skills are waiting for you to collect!
instructions: Each cat has a unique career setting: chef, waiter, pastry chef, and even delivery guy! Combine and utilize their strengths to make your restaurant run more efficiently. Upgrade kitchen equipment, improve service efficiency, and expand menu content by earning coins.

title: Idle Bathroom Empire Tycoon
description: Ready to become the ultimate bathroom tycoon? In this exciting mix of simulation, management, and idle tycoon gameplay, you’ll start with a small restroom. Grow it into a luxurious five-star hygiene haven! Upgrade facilities, optimize services, and expand your empire to make your bathroom the most popular spot in town. Manage your front desk with care, and faster cashiering will give you more cash flow.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Hole Digger
description: Grab your shovel and start your journey deep into the earth. Mine valuable resources, upgrade your tools, level up your skills, and unlock new opportunities for even faster digging. The deeper you dig, the richer the treasures. Can you reach the very bottom?
instructions: You'll be digging the ground, extracting valuable resources, and selling them. Use the money you earn to upgrade your stats and speed up your digging. Controls: - WASD — Move - Space — Jump - Double Space + Hold — Fly (after purchasing the jetpack) - Left Mouse Button — Dig/Collect resources - E — Interact with elements in the garage - Q — back to menu

title: Clinic Cleanup Crew
description: Players play the role of cleaners in the health center in the game. They are responsible for the cleaning and sanitation work in all areas within the health center, keeping the environment of the health center clean and hygienic and providing a good environment for clients. The game features a fresh and lovely art style, with the details of characters and buildings depicted vividly, bringing players a healing visual enjoyment.
instructions: There is a variety of cleaning tasks: including common cleaning jobs such as sweeping the floor, mopping the floor, wiping surfaces, and disposing of garbage. Different areas have their corresponding cleaning tasks and requirements. When cleaning, players can also use a wide range of cleaning tools and equipment like brooms, mops, vacuum cleaners, rags, disinfectants and so on to complete the cleaning tasks.

title: Hunting underwater spearfishing
description: Hunting underwater spearfishing – a realistic diving adventure! Dive into underwater exploration as a diver in a wetsuit, hunting with scuba gear. Explore lakes, seas, and oceans, encounter 30+ marine species, and marvel at coral reefs. Freediving, underwater hunting, and treasure searches await! Upgrade harpoons, masks, and tanks, battle predators, and survive hostile depths. Discover new locations and earn rewards to improve with every dive!
instructions: PC Controls: - Move with WASD, ascend with R, descend with F. - Shoot with the left mouse button. Aim carefully and get close to the fish for a precise shot. Smartphone Controls: - Use on-screen joysticks to move. - Tap "Shoot" to fire your harpoon. Tips: - Aim carefully and shoot at the right moment. - Upgrade gear like harpoons, masks, and tanks with coins and pearls. - Explore, hunt rare fish, and unlock new locations!

title: Dictator Simulator: 1984
description: Make choices as the Supreme Leader of a dystopian state. Maintain control, balance resources, and crush opposition—or be overthrown!
instructions: Use the mouse to approve or reject requests from visitors. Each choice affects population, treasury, state power, and living standards. Lose any one — and you fall.

title: Battle Simulator - Sandbox
description: You can play against the provided levels or create your own battle. Victory depends only on the best strategy! With the most accurate placement of your army, you will achieve the best results!
instructions: For level mode: Use the gold gained in each level to select your troops and place them accurately on the map. In level mode, there is a limit on the number of warriors and gold to hire. For sandbox mode: Place both your own and the enemy army. Head to the battlefield and watch the battle simulation! In sandbox mode, restrictions are minimal. For PC Use the left or right mouse button to rotate the camera. - W-A-S-D or Arrow keys to control the camera;

title: Sandbox Island War
description: Get ready for a wonderful pixel battle in Pixel Island War! This strategy game brings you to a wonderful pixel world. Here your task is to conquer islands and expand your empire. Build bases, gather resources and prepare for fierce battles on different islands. For example, choose an island to place humans on. Humans will build towns and multiply. Choose sheep to produce wool and meat.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Pimple Squeeze
description: Pimple Squeeze – The Most Satisfying Pimple Popping Game! Love the oddly satisfying feeling of pimple popping? Get ready for Pimple Squeeze, the ultimate skincare simulation game where you pop, squeeze, and clean pores in the most relaxing way! Remove blackheads, clear whiteheads, and achieve smooth, glowing skin!
instructions: Tap & squeeze to pop pimples carefully! Remove blackheads & clean pores for fresh skin Use skincare tools like tweezers & masks for the best results Complete levels & unlock new challenges

title: Fun Town Parking
description: Funtown Parking is an exciting parking simulation game where you must follow paths and park in designated spots while avoiding obstacles and challenges. As the levels progress, the routes become more complex, testing your precision and driving skills. Can you navigate through the chaos and park without a scratch? Take on the challenge and master every level!
instructions: Keyboard Move - W/A/S/D or Arrow keys Change Gear - Shift gears to move forward or backward Camera - C to toggle camera view Mute - M to mute/unmute sound Pause - P to pause the game Reset - R to reset the game

title: Gangsta Island: Crime City
description: Dominate the streets in Gangsta Island: Crime City! Rise from a street hustler to a crime lord in this action-packed online game. Engage in heists, battle rival crews, and conquer Las Vegas. Play mini-games and climb to the top of the underworld!
instructions: WSAD and mouse - on desktop tap - on mobile devices

title: People Playground 3d
description: Playground 3D is an exciting physics-based 3D battle simulator where you can create and customize epic fights between two teams: Blue and Red. Featuring ragdoll physics and dynamic fighter movements, the game lets you design thrilling combat scenarios.
instructions: You can add objects, obstacles, and explosive bombs to create chaotic and fun battles. Experiment with different setups, place barriers, and watch as fighters collide in unpredictable ways. With a variety of interactive elements, every battle is unique and full of surprises. Unleash your creativity and build the ultimate battleground in Playground 3D!

title: Mart Puzzle Shopping Sort
description: Mart Puzzle - Shopping Sort is a fun blend of simulation and brain-teasing management, where you get to run your very own mini-mart! As a store manager, you will be responsible for sorting out goods and processing orders.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Noob fun fishing
description: Catch all the fish with Noob - from small to very large, normal and predatory. Upgrade your fishing rod, buy and upgrade your boat, use modifiers for your fishing rod. Open the catalog of all the fish in the game.
instructions: Controls: 1. Cast/pull the rod - any mouse button (right/left); 2. Move left - "F" key; 3. Move right - "B" key.

title: Panda Shop Simulator
description: Do you love shopping at supermarkets? Now you can build your own! Play as a cute panda owner and grow your store from a small corner shop to a bustling retail empire. Earn money to hire assistants and upgrade facilities to the max level. Enjoy playful twist with adorable panda characters that make running your shop even more fun and exciting!
instructions: Use WASD / ARROW KEY / MOUSE to control the character.

title: Real Car Parking Simulator
description: Get ready to test your driving skills in Real Car Parking Simulator. In the parking simulation game, you will face various parking challenges. With realistic controls and detailed environments,you’ll feel like you're actually behind the wheel. From parallel parking to tight garage spaces, this game offers many parking challenges.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Hidden Mushrooms
description: Hidden Mushrooms is a game for nature lovers and those who enjoy walking in the woods. Beautiful views of nature in different forests, fields, swamps and other places. Birds singing and cute animals help you relax, and the search for hidden mushrooms captures your attention. You will spend time usefully, because the game perfectly trains your observation skills! Do you like hidden object searches? Then be sure to try to find hidden mushrooms!
instructions: Each level has a new forest with its own type of mushroom. Use your keen eye and attention to spot the hidden mushrooms. When you spot a mushroom, tap on it to collect it. Collect mushrooms and unlock new levels. The menu shows the number of mushrooms needed to unlock each level. The first forest is available right away. Watch the mushroom counter in the menu to track your progress.

title: Chill Girl Clicker
description: Chill Girl Clicker is a soothing, laid-back clicker game that’s perfect for unwinding and finding your zen. Just like its predecessor, Chill Girl Clicker, this game offers a serene and calming experience, but with a delightful twist: a charming girl as the main character, bringing a fresh and enchanting vibe to your screen.
instructions: Click to play!

title: Airport Controller
description: Take control in Airport Controller Game! Manage planes, guide safe landings, refuel, repair, and board passengers while handling growing airport traffic. Test your skills in this fast-paced simulation and keep everything running smoothly. Play now!
instructions: Move Plane - Drag with mouse to take the plane to the desired location Pause - P

title: Bus Driver Simulator 3D
description: Bus Driver Simulator 3D is a bus simulator in which you will be able to drive different types of buses traveling around different parts of the world including Los Angeles, Berlin, Rome, Alaska and so on. Each scenario in Bus Driver Simulator 3D has special characteristics. So, for example, in Alaska you will be driving on snowy tundra, and other cars will not be very much, but on the city highway in Los Angeles the traffic will be more intense.
instructions: Management: On mobile devices: Use the buttons on the phone screen. On PCs: - W-A-S-D keys to control the bus; - Spacebar - handbrake; - C - change camera view; - G - horn; - Q - left turn signal; - E - right turn signal; - Esc - pause.

title: Gem Deep Digger
description: Dive deep into the underground world of Gem Deep Digger. In a fun and addictive simulation game,you dig, collect, and upgrade to uncover hidden treasures. With simple one-button controls, anyone can become the ultimate miner. Use your dig to carve through layers of dirt and rock, uncovering sparkling gems in the ground.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: The Last Tiger: Tank Simulator
description: An incredible adventure in the world of tank battles awaits you! Get ready to immerse yourself in the exciting world of tank battles. In this game, you will take control of one of the most famous tanks of World War II, the Tiger. Your task is to survive and win the fiercest battles.
instructions: W / A / S / D - movement Mouse - camera LMB - shoot RMB - aim Mouse wheel - adjust scope range Space - assist aiming ECS - pause V - change ammo type F - change camera

title: Kinder Garden
description: Run your own daycare in this hyper-casual arcade game! Care for babies by feeding, changing diapers, and keeping them happy. Unlock new rooms, toys, and upgrades to grow your nursery. Enjoy simple controls, fun gameplay, and happy rewards. Play now!
instructions: ⁃ Move with the joystick; ⁃ Come to the diapers to take them; ⁃ Come to the baby to change the diaper; ⁃ Take a bottle and go to the baby to feed; ⁃ Take the baby and go to the crib to put him to bed.

title: Online Car Destruction Simulator 3D
description: Experience a high-speed realistic car collision simulator! Drive down slopes and crash into specialized obstacles with various vehicles, all featuring authentic physics and a detailed damage system with separating parts.
instructions: TAB - pause menu (or Escape) Moving W (forward), S (backward), A (left), D (right). Spacebar - handbrake. Shift - nitro. C - change camera. U - free camera. R - reset car. K - restore car. B - slow down time. N - switch car.

title: Fix The Hoof
description: Fix The Hoof is a soothing simulation game where you take on the role of a hoof care specialist, restoring and beautifying the hooves of animals like horses, cows, and goats. Enjoy deeply satisfying ASMR moments as you clean, polish, and paint hooves in this engaging 3D experience. Earn money from your services to upgrade your farm and expand your collection of animals to care for.
instructions: Click on interactive elements on the screen using the mouse or touchpad to clean, polish, and paint hooves.

title: Cop Simulator
description: Cop Simulator is an exciting and dynamic gaming experience that immerses you in the world of a lawman with unlimited possibilities. In this game you will take on the role of a cop, where you are given complete freedom of action.
instructions: Controls on the desktop - WASD for movement, Mouse for viewing, Space for jumping, C for crouching, F for interacting with cars. Control on a mobile device - touch/swipe.

title: Brawl Stars Sound
description: Listen to the voices and enjoy the visuals of the Brawl Stars characters. Start your sound-filled brawling adventure and enjoy a unique auditory twist in your gaming routine!
instructions: Press the buttons of different characters to hear unique sounds and see exciting visual effects appear!

title: My Farm
description: Become the proud owner of your very own farm! Grow crops, tend to animals, catch fish, and set up production. Assemble collections of exotic animals in the zoo, meet the mysterious visitors, and embark on thrilling adventures!
instructions: My Farm is an enthralling farming game with a tried and tested gameplay formula adored by millions of players! Develop your farm, manufacture new types of goods, and complete exciting tasks! Get rare Chests, exotic animals, and colorful decorations for your farm! Find your friends and make new ones! Create farmers guilds together, send each other gifts, and take part in nail-biting tournaments and fun theme festivities!

title: WorldCraft 3
description: Are you ready to survive in pixel world ? This is a challenge game survive in the pixel worlds, You have to prepare for every situations. You can fly and with your grenade you explode blocks world. You can collect items to your inventory
instructions: Movement: W,A,S,D Break: Left Click Mouse Build: Right Click Mouse Fly: F Inventory: Tab Choose Items: 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,0 Back to Menu: Escape

title: Build A Rich Queen
description: Make the most accurate choice and become the most beautiful queen! In Build A Rich Queen, you will bring your credit card. When you encounter a POS machine on the road, you can directly swipe the card to buy clothes and other decorations. These decorations will allow you to pass obstacles without directly failing the game, but you will lose these decorations. But pay attention to the road under your feet, don't fall suddenly, otherwise, you will directly fail the game.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Squishy: Taba Paw ASMR
description: A cute collection of relaxing taba paws and other squishes on your smartphone! Relax by sipping squishes in different directions and enjoy sound of squishing!
instructions: Stretch the squishes in different directions and collect coins. On a PC with the mouse, and on a smartphone with the touch of your fingers! Collect the whole collection of bright and realistic squishes!

title: Pixel Mini Golf
description: Mini Golf is a complete game, with 400 different levels, and an addictive system. Have fun exploring the game’s green hills and plains while listening to the birds and enjoying its beautiful views, collect as many coins as possible and try to hit all the holes to achieve the highest score. Among the game mechanics are levels with: Portals, Boxing Gloves, Cannons, Burners, Impulses, Mill, Sand, Mole Holes, Spikes and Movement Blocks that will help or hinder your game!
instructions: Compatible with all devices (Mouse and touch controls)

title: Parking Master Urban Challenges
description: A realistic 3D parking simulator where you can hone your driving skills and become a real parking master! Get behind the wheel of realistic cars of different sizes and maneuver through crowded city streets, parking in the most difficult places. Pass all the tests, become a parking master and prove that you can do any maneuver!
instructions: WASD or arrows — movement and rotation of the car. The space bar is the handbrake. E or ~ — open the game menu. M — switch the camera. When playing in the first person, use Shift to zoom in on the camera.

title: Spaceflight Simulator
description: Do you have a space dream? Spaceflight Simulator is a challenging spaceflight simulation game suitable for boys who love to build and launch rockets. The game has real-life conditions in space.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Loop Survivors Zombie City
description: A fast-paced action-survival game where you fight zombies and mutants, upgrade your city and character, collect weapons and armor. Build your shelter, unlock random perks, and become the ultimate survivor!
instructions: Control a hero who navigates through cyclic locations, battling waves of zombies and mutants. Collect weapons, armor, and choose random perks to strengthen your character. After each cycle, you can build and upgrade your city, as well as improve your shelter and hero. Every run makes you stronger and brings you closer to victory!

title: TearDown - Destruction SandBox
description: The player is given complete freedom of action. You can explore various locations filled with structures. The main feature of the game is the ability to destroy everything you see. Have you ever wanted to level a multi-storey house with your own hands? Now you have the opportunity to do just that! The physics of destruction is close to reality. You can use a variety of weapons to destroy objects, from a hammer to a powerful bazooka.
instructions: Control of the game: WASD - Movement. Space - Jump. Esc - Pause. Mouse - Overview. Left Shift - Running. Left mouse button - Shot, throw. I - Inventory. M - Map.

title: Airport Master Plane Tycoon
description: Airport Master - Plane Tycoon is an airport management simulation game. With 3D stickman models, you can control the manager of a larger airport. Each level has a target passenger for you to complete. You can unlock the gate, scanner, security check, and lounge in the tutorials.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Idle Bank
description: Idle Bank is not merely a management game but also a simulation game. With 3D stickman characters in a bank, you can control the manager to develop a bank. First, you can use the starting money to unlock a basic Reception to absorb customers. When people come into the bank and save their money here, you can take away them to unlock new facilities and hire assistants. Don't forget to upgrade your character for better capacity ability and higher speed.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Mobile Phone Case Diy
description: This is a mobile phone case game that was designed. Have you ever wanted to create a fashion phone case of your own? In the game, you can show your creativity, enjoy the art of customisation and see your phone evolve the way you like. You can choose your favourite colours, draw, mix, and spray paint your phone case.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Wild Hunting Clash
description: Challenge yourself and hunt beautiful animals in stunningly luscious woods. The calming sounds of the forest and lovely graphics will capture your heart. Feel like a true hunter in the unconquered wilderness!
instructions: Shoot the animals and collect their trophies in all the different levels to progress to the next region. Unlock and upgrade your hunting gear using the gold you get as a reward.

title: Cat Life Merge Money
description: Experience the life of a stray cat, beg from humans, earn money to buy food, and merge the money you beg to get more money. Only by acting quickly can you enter the rich cat life! First of all,all you need to do is click on the cat and let it beg all the time. Otherwise, it will be lazy.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Magnet Truck
description: What happens if you take a car with a huge magnet? It could pull metal right out of the ground and rocks! Upgrade and get more and more expensive metals!
instructions: - Use WASD to move your truck

title: Flick Baseball Super Homerun
description: Experience various baseball pitches based on the pendulum movement. The ball will fly further if you can hit the ball directly with the quick flick. Experience a “real-life like” batting simulation in this baseball game. # One Flick Easy Control You only use flick to control the batting for this game. The more accurate you flick your finger to hit the ball; it is more likely that you will be a home-run hitter.
instructions: Left mouse button

title: Chrono Drive
description: It's a game where you have to travel to the finish line without hitting any obstacles/ other cars. Other cars/obstacles move in sync with your movement and there are also additional twists to time mechanics.
instructions: Touch inputs/ WASD to move, E on some maps to change flow of time.

title: Battle Tanks Firestorm
description: This game has incorporated the best of famous tank games. You can choose the tank that you like best, or prefer a more powerful version. Go to the levels and defend your base from the enemy. At your disposal are more than 15 types of tanks with various upgrades: armor, upgrades of the first, second and third levels. These improvements will help you gain an advantage over the enemy tank army.
instructions: * WASD - move; * Left mouse button — shooting; * Esc - pause.

title: Angry City Smasher
description: Angry City Smasher is a third-person RPG fighting simulation game with 3D-armed gorillas. Your goal is to defeat the enemy monster and destroy the marked number of buildings. Use the Ultimate Smash to make AOE damage and destroy more buildings with one hit. To be honest, it is necessary to defeat your opponent first because it will run to you on the level. No one wants to be disturbed by others. Good luck!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Cleaning Simulator
description: Cleaning Simulator is a very fun simulation game. Although this game is 2D, it restores the shape of objects in real life very well. This game has a total of 12 parts, covering sports cars, technological products, daily necessities, and other elements, which will definitely meet all your expectations for cleaning games. Want to know more about this game? Come and try it!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Fennec The Fox Click Adventure
description: Embark on a cosmic adventure with Fennec the Fox! Tap your way across the desert, unlocking upgrades that transform Fennec into a powerful cosmic traveler. Explore new worlds, face thrilling challenges, and evolve Fennec to reach the stars. Can you guide Fennec to the farthest reaches of the universe? Start clicking and discover the wonders that await!
instructions: Click on Fennec: Start by tapping on Fennec the Fox to earn points and progress through the game. Upgrade Fennec: Use your points to purchase upgrades that boost Fennec's abilities and speed up your progress. Evolve and Advance: As you level up, Fennec will evolve, unlocking new powers and moving from the desert to increasingly advanced environments. Reach the Universe: Your ultimate goal is to guide Fennec from the desert sands to the farthest reaches of space.

title: Banana Farm
description: Embark on Banana Farm, an engaging business casual game catering to cat enthusiasts. As a diligent feline entrepreneur, oversee market operations and recruit adorable cat workers to enhance efficiency. Cultivate bananas and various products while serving charming cat customers eagerly queuing up. Ready to launch your supermarket?
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play
